name: seelf
description: Seelf is a self-hosted journaling and diary platform with encryption, a clean UI, and tagging for organizing entries. Built for personal privacy and reflection.
features: Encrypted journaling: Store diary entries with end-to-end encryption for complete privacy.
Daily entries: Create and organize journal entries by date with calendar navigation.
Tag organization: Categorize entries with tags for easy filtering and discovery.
Rich text editor: Format entries with markdown or rich text formatting options.
Search functionality: Find past entries quickly with full-text search across all content.
Mood tracking: Log daily moods and emotions to identify patterns over time.
Photo attachments: Add images to entries to capture visual memories.
Export options: Download journal data as PDF or markdown for backup and archiving.
Reminders: Set daily reminders to maintain consistent journaling habits.
Statistics: View writing streaks, entry counts, and journaling patterns.
Dark mode: Switch between light and dark themes for comfortable writing.
Mobile responsive: Access and write entries from any device with adaptive layout.
